abstract.p: Westchester Community College in Valhalla, NY, for fifth consecutive year, freezes tuition at $98 a credit, or $2,350 a year for full-time students (S)

block.p: For the fifth consecutive year, Westchester Community College will hold tuition steady at $98 a credit, or $2,350 a year for a full-time student. The average community college tuition in the State University of New York system is $2,480 a year. Under the $83 million college budget approved for 2000-01 by the county's Board of Legislators, there will be money to expand the main campus in Valhalla and open centers in Ossining and Yonkers. The county has increased its contribution to the college this year to $14.9 million, an increase of 5.6 percent.
